Home.spleetDescription: Spleet! is a convenient web app that allows you to easily split bills with friends in group settings. Say goodbye to the stress of handling money transactions, whether it's dining out at a restaurant or expenses during trips.
Home.transparentSplittingDescription: In Spleet!, we clearly display who paid how much for what. This enables fair distribution of expenses among each member.
Home.instantCalculationDescription: Spleet! takes care of the cumbersome bill splitting calculations for you. It instantly calculates payment amounts and shares the results immediately.
Home.easyOperationDescription: With an intuitive interface, anyone can easily use Spleet!. No special skills are required.

CreateBill.newBillDescription: Create a new bill and add participants to split the cost.
